scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:ts && npm run clean:arkts
scripts.generate:ts: npm run clean:ts && cd ../../../../ && npm run compile --prefix ./runner && node ./runner m3 sdk-patched-arkts external --language ts
scripts.generate:arkts: npm run clean:arkts && cd ../../../../ && npm run compile --prefix ./runner && node ./runner m3 sdk-patched-arkts external --language arkts --options-file external/arkoala-arkts/tools/peer-generator/config-arkui.json
scripts.generate:all: npm run generate:ts && npm run generate:arkts
